name: Boingy
description:
Gameplay:
The objective is to move your ball through the obstacles to make it to the goal. For an extra challenge, try getting all three stars hidden within the level.

Features:
20 Levels, each a little more complicated than the last.
3 tokens in every level that can be collected for a one time
bonus of coins.
11 ball icons to purchase
